Tucson keeps firing as he continues to back up Vestige with all his dedicat=
ion.  He finds that physical fire isn't much good against the insects but w=
hen he did excercise spiritual power, it seemed to help Vestige and himself=
 immensely.  He thinks for a moment and looks to Vestige.

"Vestige, our po=
wer lies in something that these insects do not have.  Our hearts.  The sim=
plest power of all, one that all living creatures are capable of expressing=
, and the one ability that these creatures do not possess.  We must use tha=
t power now if we're going to vanquish our enemy and get Rodimus back.  it =
will unite all three of us, and only then, can we defeat this foe."

His ch=
est now pulsating as it had before, with the force of a beating heart fille=
d with compassionate power.  Several plates on his chest shift, as a well p=
rotected heart like structure beats luminously.  He looks to Vestige.

" Ou=
r compassion for each other, our loyalty to our comrades, our love for our =
fellow Autobots.  That is the one power that can never be extinguished.  Yo=
u believe in that power, reach down, touch it, and allow yourself to allow =
it to flow freely within you.  It will light all flames as it has for centu=
ries.  We can do this Vestige, we can do this.  For Rodimus Prime, our hear=
ts are with him, as his is with us.  Let's unite them and end this once and=
 for all."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@.=

ttack!
